## mergeApplyMap variable

Similar to `mergeApplyObj()`<!-- -->, but for ES6 Maps instead of plain objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mergeApplyMap: <K, V>(src: Map<K, V>, xs: Map<K, V | Fn<V, V>>) => Map<K, V>
```
